entry.title: Ukraine Tech Startups Pivot From Software Code to Rescue Plans
entry.content: Heads of tech startups with operations in Ukraine, like StarWind Software, Lemon,io and People.ai, are running their businesses from places like Poland, Israel and Silicon Valley—and helping evacuate and defend Ukraine.

entry.title: Russia's Halting Progress in Attack on Ukraine Puts Focus on Resupply Efforts
entry.content: Russia appears to be preparing to reset its forces after more than three brutal weeks of combat and limited ground gains in its assault on Ukraine, while the situation in the embattled port city of Mariupol worsened.

entry.title: China Says Housing Prices Are Stable, but Developers See Significant Declines
entry.content: One main reason for the diverging picture is the composition of the country’s official data, economists and property analysts say.
